snippet.title: Pilot Sports - Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
We're proud to present new trailer from our project: PilotSports!!! This is a sunny and funny flying game in a tropical setting with different aircrafts and several challenges! And with a really great couch multiplayer!

Features
- More than 50 courses
- Diverse aircrafts: different airplanes, jetpacks, hang gliders and a parachute
- Seven different types of challenges
- BONUS: Unlockable courses to explore the tropical island where the game takes place
- Eight playable characters
- Party game for every type of player

Website: https://z-software.net/site/pilot-sports/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PilotSportsGame

Fasten your seatbelts already! 

Platforms: 
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP0842-CUSA13412_00-0000000000000000
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/pilot-sports-switch
PC-Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/996430/Pilot_Sports
XBoxOne: https://www.microsoft.com/de-de/p/pilot-sports/9n47hw6824d7?activetab=pivot%3Aoverviewtab



Music by Sven Gerlach
